text:
@realDonaldTrump How about getting tests &supplies for the #coronavirus
Right now we're as effective as a 3rd world country

Cant you put this immature nitpicking aside and tell us what your are doing to help? 

You keep these evil tactics up, you & yours will be victims 
That is how #Karma looks https://t.co/fY12FMpHOG
